Verses: 1 karththaave, Ummudaiya Kobaththil Ennaik Kadindhukollaadheyum; Ummudaiya Ukkiraththil Ennaith Dhandiyaadheyum.
2 ummudaiya Ambugal Enakkulle Thaiththirukkiradhu; Umadhu Kai Ennai Iruththugiradhu.
3 umadhu Kobaththinaal En Maamsaththil Aarokkiyamillai; En Paavaththinaal En Elumbugalil Savukkiyamillai.
4 en Akkiramangal En Thalaikkumelaagap Perugitru, Avaigal Baarachsumaiyaippola Ennaal Thaangakkoodaadha Baaramaayitru.
5 en Madhikettinimiththam En Pungal Azhugi Naatrameduththadhu.
6 naan Vedhanaippattu Odunginen; Naalmuzhudhum Dhukkappattuth Thirigiren.
7 en Kudalgal Eripandhamaai Erigiradhu; En Maamsaththil Aarokkiyam Illai.
8 naan Belanatruppoi, Migavum Norukkappatten; En Irudhayaththin Kondhalippinaal Kadharugiren.
9 aandavare, En Engalellaam Umakku Munbaaga Irukkiradhu; En Thavippu Umakku Maraivaayirukkavillai.
10 en Ullam Kuzhambi Alaigiradhu; En Belan Ennai Vittu Vilagi, En Kangalin Oli Mudhalaai Illaamarpoyitru.
11 en Sinegidharum En Thozharum En Vaadhaiyaik Kandu Vilagugiraargal; En Inaththaarum Dhooraththile Nirkiraargal.
12 en Piraananai Vaangaththedugiravargal Enakkuk Kannigalai Vaikkiraargal; Enakkup Pollaangu Thedugiravargal Kedaanavaigalaippesi, Naalmuzhudhum Vanjanaigalai Yosikkiraargal.
13 naano Sevidanaippolak Kelaadhavanaagavum, Oomaiyanaippola Vaaithiravaadhavanaagavum Irukkiren.
14 kaadhukelaadhavanum, Than Vaayil Maruuththaravugal Illaadhavanumaayirukkira Manushanaippolaanen.
15 karththaave, Umakkuk Kaaththirukkiren; En Dhevanaagiya Aandavare, Neer Maruuththaravu Koduppeer.
16 avargal Ennimiththam Sandhoshappadaadhabadikku Ippadich Sonnen; En Kaal Thavarumbodhu Enmel Perumaipaaraattuvaargale.
17 naan Thadumaari Vizha Edhuvaayirukkiren; En Dhukkam Eppozhudhum En Munbaaga Irukkiradhu.
18 en Akkiramaththai Naan Arikkaiyittu, En Paavaththinimiththam Visaarappadugiren.
19 en Saththurukkal Vaazhndhu Balaththirukkiraargal; Mugaandharamillaamal Ennaip Pagaikkiravargal Perugiyirukkiraargal.
20 naan Nanmaiyaip Pinbatrugirabadiyaal, Nanmaikkuth Theemai Seygiravargal Ennai Virodhikkiraargal.
21 karththaave, Ennaik Kaividaadheyum; En Dhevane, Enakkuth Dhooramaayiraadheyum.
22 en Ratchippaagiya Aandavare, Enakkuch Sagaayanjeyyath Theeviriyum.
